I want to invest in mutual funds but when I am clicking on the payment option then by default I am being landed on UPI page. In the initial time it had all the payment options, but now it's only UPI. My 4 or 5 UPI payment has declined due to glitches which I mentioned earlier. Hope Groww fixes this soon.
